meta.title: About Us | 25 Years of Digital Back Office Experience
meta.description: Discover Outsourcing Group: since 1999, a partner for BPO and digital back office services. 25 years of experience, partner of European certification authorities.

hero.title: Professionals in step with the evolution of the digital sector
hero.description: Since 1999, we have been supporting companies with constantly evolving digital services, integrating technologies and expertise to ensure operational management, quality and compliance in an ever-changing market.

80s90s.title: The data entry era
80s90s.description: In the 1990s, the company operated as Leondata Srl, specializing in data entry services and the manual transcription of data from paper documents to management systems, laying the foundations for modern back office services. The main activities concern the entry and management of large volumes of administrative and tax data. Leondata later became a founding member of the Outsourcing Group Consortium, bringing expertise and know-how in digital data processing.

98_99.title: Optical archiving
98_99.description: During these years, the Consortium transformed into Outsourcing Group Srl and contributed to one of the first major national digitization projects: the optical archiving of financial statements and documents of Italian Chambers of Commerce. Millions of documents are digitized and the first secure digital preservation infrastructures are built. It's one of the most significant moments in the company's history: from data digitization to massive document digitization, laying the foundation for modern document management services.

2005.title: PEC (Certified Electronic Mail)
2005.description: The PEC introduces a new way of communicating with legal value, accelerating administrative processes and reducing dependence on paper. It is the beginning of the digital transformation in official communications between companies, professionals and Public Administration.

2011.title: The start of the PEC activation service for a European certification authority
2011.description: Outsourcing Group initiates operational management of PEC activations for a leading European certification authority. The team is responsible for data verification, quality control, and activation of PEC boxes, operating on high-volume processes and certified requirements. Over time, the service has evolved towards self-service online portals, with the continuous support of Outsourcing Group in the verification and user assistance phases.

2013.title: Outsourcing Group begins issuing first digital signatures
2013.description: After the introduction of digital signatures in Italy in 2010, Outsourcing Group began operating directly in the sector in 2013 as an operating partner of one of Europe's leading certification authorities. The team manages data verification, user identification, certificate issuance and technical assistance on Business Keys, Smart Cards, and remote digital signatures.

2016.title: SPID and digital identity
2016.description: With the birth of SPID, which in just a few years becomes the main tool for accessing public and private digital services, the demand for specialized support and assistance is growing. Outsourcing Group starts, from the early stages, the management of SPID activations, dealing with document verification and identity control over high volumes.

2018.title: GDPR comes into force
2018.description: The European Data Protection Regulation introduces stringent requirements on security, processes, traceability and information management. Companies must adjust procedures and systems. Outsourcing Group begins a comprehensive adjustment journey, supported by a company specializing in data security and GDPR regulation.

2023.title: Approval of the Data Act
2023.description: The new European regulatory framework dedicated to data, data sharing and governance is coming. Businesses are called upon to manage even more structured and secure processes.

today.title: Artificial Intelligence in operational processes
today.description: AI begins to support data, document and ticket management, making processes faster, tidier and more traceable. Companies are preparing for a new phase of digital efficiency.

costruiamo.title: Let's Build the Right Solution for Your Company Together
costruiamo.description: Every company has different needs. We listen to your requirements and together analyze the most effective way to outsource processes and improve operational management.

valori.title: The Values We Bring to Our Partners

reliability.title: Reliability & Transparency
reliability.description: Our processes are certified and compliant with regulations, giving you complete security.

flexibility.title: Flexibility & Partnership
flexibility.description: Adapting to large companies, SMEs, and public administration, we offer tailored and white-label solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation & Expertise
innovation.description: We invest in continuous team training and the adoption of digital tools that simplify work, without replacing the value of human experience.

assistance.title: Assistance & Satisfaction
assistance.description: We put the client at the center of every process: we respond with speed, precision, and competent human support.

sustainability.title: Sustainability & Ethics
sustainability.description: We promote ESG policies, a code of ethics, and 231 models, because ethical business generates lasting value.

team.title: Together, We Turn Every Service into Results
team.description1: Outsourcing processes and sensitive data requires trust. That's why our team works with <bold>transparency, method</bold> and a <bold>continuous collaborative approach</bold> with every client.
team.description2: For over twenty years, we have operated in <bold>digital trust</bold>, combining technical skills and attention to people. Every team member is directly informed about the client's procedures and operational flows, gaining in-depth knowledge of their working methods and specific practices to manage. This allows us to operate as a <bold>true extension of your internal department</bold>, ensuring precision, consistency, and continuity over time.
team.description3: We believe in collaboration as a driver of mutual growth: every project becomes an opportunity to improve together with our clients, sharing knowledge and solutions.
